review: I'm not impressed. I bought the Fire TV because the selection on my cable TV was so utterly terrible. What I am finding withe the Fire TV is that ut has the same drivel, only on demand instead of scheduled. But my tastes are different from most people, I guess. I like opera, classical concerts, and well-made programs like Downton Abbey. But there's only so many times you can watch the few good programs available on Fire TV.  So for me, it's back to watching DVDs.
